# Interface LongTermMemoryConfigInterface

Interface for configuring long-term memory behavior. Long-term memory represents persistent memories across multiple conversations.

interface LongTermMemoryConfigInterface {  
maxNumberOfFlashMemory?: number;  
maxNumberOfTopics?: number;  
maxTopicSummaryLenToAppend?: number;  
textGenerationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

maxNumberOfFlashMemory? maxNumberOfTopics? maxTopicSummaryLenToAppend? textGenerationConfig?

## Properties

### `Optional`maxNumberOfFlashMemory

maxNumberOfFlashMemory?: number

Maximum number of flash memories to consider for long-term memory creation

### `Optional`maxNumberOfTopics

maxNumberOfTopics?: number

Maximum number of topics to maintain in long-term memory

### `Optional`maxTopicSummaryLenToAppend

maxTopicSummaryLenToAppend?: number

Maximum length of topic summary to append to long-term memory

### `Optional`textGenerationConfig

textGenerationConfig?: [TextGenerationConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_text_generator.TextGenerationConfigInterface)

Configuration for text generation used in memory processing
